articles.title: PBKS vs LSG, IPL 2023, Highlights: Marcus Stoinis, Kyle Mayers sizzle in Lucknow Super Giants' big win ov - Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Marcus Stoinis and Kyle Mayers scored brutal fifties, while medium pacer Yash Thakur claimed four wickets as Lucknow Super Giants crushed Punjab Kings
